org.lindbergframework.persistence.impl
Class LinpSpringJdbcTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.jdbc.support.JdbcAccessor
      org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate
          org.lindbergframework.persistence.impl.LinpSpringJdbcTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcOperations
public class LinpSpringJdbcTemplate
extends org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate

lindberg spring jdbcTemplate extension that uses LinpPreparedStatementSetter as PreparedStatementSetter implementation.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
